1: Amazing experience that will instantly put a smile on your face
My wife and I did a quick getaway to SLS and had the most awesome time
Fitness center was nice and had working cardio machines
However it is in the perfect location for our trip and everything was taken care of from start to finish
When we went back to our room there was a wonderful note from Zachary and a chilled bottle of wine
There is a giant pig sculpture in the kids pool a fun twist
I really like to come to this hotel
One of the most fun yet elegant places to host a party
I ’m sure I will be staying there again in the near future and also recommend others
